metadata.job_to_be_done: Analyze revenue trends, R&D investments, and market positioning strategies

extracted_sections.explanation: Matched persona/job keywords (score: 4.00); Semantic similarity: 0.41; Topic overlap: market; Structural boost applied (x0.84); Persona-specific high-value content found (score: 2.00); Section title matches job keywords (boost: 6.00)
extracted_sections.summary:
TechCorp maintains strong market positions in cloud infrastructure (35% market share), AI platforms
(28% market share), and enterprise software (22% market share). We continue to expand into
emerging markets and new technology sectors.

extracted_sections.summary:
We invested $2.3 billion in research and development in 2022, representing 15% of total revenue. Key
focus areas include artificial intelligence, quantum computing, and cybersecurity. Our R&D; team grew
to 5,000 engineers and scientists.
